[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
GIB
enum GIB {...}

when calling Killed(), a value that governs gib behavior is expected to be one of these three values

Values
GIB_NORMAL

(0) gib if entity was overkilled

GIB_NEVER

(1) never gib, no matter how much death damage is done ( freezing, etc )

GIB_ALWAYS

(2) always gib ( Houndeye Shock, Barnacle Bite )

GIB_NOPENALTY

(3) No penalty applied to players that died
